ok u all have pretty much jumped on his case. It would have been better just 
to correct him and tell him his mistakes. In my opinion that was a stupid 
thing to say cause I thought the movie ruled and the few espidoes of the 
regular transformers rule espically optimus. growing up with him as a hero 
was cool. The only thing I liked about beast machines is the new way of 
transforming and the way cheetor had to fight. But I am asking nicely please 
just lay off of him the ones that been around know that yanshosh would never 
have allowed most of this (no offense rauq).


and to the leader of the maximal would it be ok if one of my guys (icedemon) 
be the second in command to the maximals
